text: right|200px Vladimir Ivanovich Dolgikh (; 5 December 1924 - 8 October 2020) was a Russian politician. He was born in Ilansky, Yeniseysk Governorate, Soviet Union. He was head of the Metallurgical Department of the Central Committee Secretariat of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union.David A. Law Russian civilization, MSS Information Corp., New York, 1975; p. 240 He was a candidate member (non-voting) of the Politburo from 1982 to 1988. From 2013 to 2018, Dolgikh was the Senator from Moscow. Dolgikh died on 8 October 2020 in Moscow at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Members of the Federation Council (Russia)
title: Vladimir Dolgikh
